summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Davis Place, from Dearborn Street to Norman Street; Nineteenth Avenue South, from Charles Street to Dearborn Street; Dearborn Street, from Hiawatha Place to Twenty-first Avenue South; Norman Street, from Davis Place to Twenty-first Avenue South; Charles Street, from Hiawatha Place to Twentieth Avenue South; Bush Place, from Corwin Place to Davis Place, and Corwin Place, from Atlantic Street to Norman Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading the same, and by constructing all necessary curbs and gutters, in accordance with Resolution No. 929 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
